title: Stenographer Grade-‘D’
details_list: Speed of 80 W.P.M. in English Shorthand and 40 W.P.M. in English Typing and possessing diploma in computer applications.
Applications should be sent for each post in separate envelopes, superscribing the post applied for, and should reach the head office within 30 days of advertisement in the prescribed format.
Examination will be conducted for Stenographer Grade-D.
